description: The dead are imprisoned in a cage, while the living are confined to the past. A mysterious small town, where the cycle of cause and effect is hard to find its end In the end, how should we make a decision and who can survive

name: Snow Ash
description: "Snow Ash" is a stand-alone independent game about running a business in the snowy wasteland developed by 3 people! The player plays the role of a courier who delivers goods on the snow. The delivery process will be presented in a light Rogue+DBG way, with some survival elements.

name: Overview: Rain Echoes
description: Overview: Rain Echoes is a music adventure game where players explore the City of Rain, divided between day and night. Using a music box as a guide, players will collect scattered melodies, restore them, and perform the music to awaken forgotten memories and hear long-lost stories.

name: Akuro & Bahaku: Jungle Adventure
description: Akuro and Bahaku were happily living in the jungle when the forces of darkness suddenly attacked, shrouding the entire jungle in darkness. Akuro and Bahaku had no choice but to set out on a journey to find a way to combat the darkness...

name: Lythe The Forgetful Witch: A Visual Novel
description: Guide Lythe, a naïve witch on a journey through the spooky world of Samhain, as she seeks the High Witch and rediscovers her magic. This visual novel features spell crafting, rune seeking, and memory game mechanics, all while unraveling the desires of her monstrous friends!

description: Drive the Australian C44Aci diesel locomotives, in various versions of the Aurizon liveries, most with multiple weathering levels and all with custom features, including custom cab views, animated doors and windows, and more.

name: Coastal World
description: Coastal World is an immersive 3D web platform that promotes, educates, and informs visitors about digital banking solutions that best fit their lifestyle, values, or specific financial situations through a fun and engaging online experience.

name: Trainz 2019: NSW Bradken 120T Coal Hopper Mega Pack
description: First introduced in 2007 for coal usage across the Hunter Valley. By 2023 over 1000 hoppers had been constructed and are used by various companies. This pack features variants for PN, GWA, ORA, Glencore, Xstrata, and Whitehaven liveries.

name: Trainz 2019: [TL] Rainsville - Danville
description: This is a fictional map based on American railroads. The train yards were modeled after real-life prototypes from the USA. Among them are Rainville, which is based on Effingham (Illinois), Milford, which is based on Terre Haute (Indiana), and Danville, which is based on Danville (Illinois).

name: Trainz 2019: SA AN Class - Pacific National
description: The AN Class entered service on Australian National's standard gauge network from Broken Hill to Adelaide, Alice Springs and Perth. In 1995, all were leased to National Rail with the transfer of AN's interstate operations. This pack features two Pacific National livery AN Class locos.

name: There's No Dragon!
description: Alone on a plot of land with a few resources and a single building, your civilization will begin here. Exploit resources, explore and conquer other regions, develop technologies, and fend off relentless barbarian attacks. Everything is manageable: they don't have a dragon!

name: Deepy
description: Deepy is an underwater complex built to house a maximum-security prison, where the most dangerous inmates on earth are forced to work extracting gold from the seabed.Your task? Fight, help survivors, search for objects and solve puzzles all to survive, escape and reach the surface.

name: Versus in the Dark
description: Up to 4 players intense duels, Free4all or team play, Online and Local !Hide and unleash the fury of your lightsaber katana to survive in this high-speed, one-hit-kill platform fighter where everyone's invisible!

name: Pararecords
description: As a counselor in a mysterious facility, you are to examine children with strange powers and fill in their "Paranormal Records". In this story-based, choice-driven game, you will have to pry open your subjects' minds... but what you find inside them could prove dangerous.

name: Shred! Remastered + Shred! 2 Bundle

description: Commander: Europe at War is a turn-based strategy game and a remake of the 2007 classic. Spanning six epic WWII campaigns, command air, land, and sea forces, research advanced technologies, manage resources, and strategically assign commanders to shift the course of battle.

description: Prepare to return to the definitive naval warfare simulation game, Rule the Waves 3, with the new Expanded Battles expansion! Take your love and knowledge of 20th century naval warfare from the exciting campaigns of the base game and get ready to craft and fight the naval battles of your dreams.

name: Match Point
description: Match Point is a tennis video game released in 1984–1985 for the Amstrad CPC, Atari ST, Commodore 64, ZX Spectrum and Sinclair QL by Psion and other publishers and, under the title Tournament Tennis, on ColecoVision , Commodore 64 and MS-DOS by Imagic. It was also published for Thomson TO7, Thomson MO6 and Thomson MO5 under the title Super Tennis. Some editions for Atari ST, Commodore 64 (on cartridge) and DOS used the simple title Tennis.

name: Word Chase
description:
Word Chase is a word building game where players attempt to find as many words in the game as possible and earn a high score.

Words must be at least 2 letters long. Each letter connects to any adjacent letter, including those beside, above, below, or diagonally. Connect letters to form words. Each letter is worth 10 points. Starting with the 6th letter in a word, each letter is worth 20 points. Words only count once, even if you find them using different paths on the grid.

name: Dalafri
description: This title is a physics-based 3D sword fighting game. Players take on the role of a slightly flexible warrior and aim to become a champion in the arena.

name: Super Sunny World
description: Super Sunny World is the ultimate love letter to the platformer greats of the 8-bit era. Jump, bump, and kick your way through 8 worlds of pixel-perfect platforming, cute characters, and exciting power-ups.

name: The Eldritch Monarch
description: "The Eldritch Monarch" is a single-player adventure game designed for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis and modern systems. Step into a Lovecraftian world shrouded in eternal winter. "The Eldritch Monarch" is a cinematic platformer enriched with stealth, combat, and intricate puzzles, providing both a nostalgic and modern gaming experience.

name: Wicked Plague
description: Play as Ramuel, a young boy who destroys his enemies with his Gun-Lighter. Get inside a haunted building and eradicate the menace!

name: The StoryTeller
description: An unreleased video game based around the anthology series of the same name.

name: Alphabet Soup for Picky Eaters
description: A single-screen puzzle made for the 2024 edition of the Confounding Calendar.

name: Oblivion Lost Remake: Vector of Alienation
description: The main feature of this modification is the professional interpretation of build stalker's storyline - turning the game into a true intellectual science fiction thriller with a deep and detailed core scenario and a lot of secondary twists and turns. Restoration of the plot content was based on many design documents of Oblivion Lost and attempted creating a cumulative, organic plot by combining the most interesting ideas of the project's changing storyline over different years

name: NLC 7: Hard Edition
description: Explore a meticulously crafted world where your decisions have consequences, and quests offer multiple completion paths. Success requires strategic planning and adaptability. Attention to detail is critical. Observe dialogues, environments, and ever-present dangers closely.

name: Rivals Hover League
description: 'Rivals Hover League' is a vehicular combat PvP game where players battle in arenas across the galaxy using hover vehicles with various abilities. Join your teammates and show off your skills - hover, boost, shoot your way to become the MVP!

name: MyRobot
description:
Adventure Character Simulator with optional AI features featuring your own robot that you can build and explore with.

Developed by sgthale, StillKill, and algernonvanpeel

name: CandyCraft
description: You want to have a journey to a peaceful and sweet country ? Too bad, if you want Candylands to be peaceful, you will have to be strong and defeat all those dangerous creatures. Explore many biomes, tame pets and dragons, fight monsters and bosses, trade with the gingerbreads villagers and travel throught massive dungeons

name: Legends of Awen: Rise of The Fianna
description: Legends of Awen: Rise of the Fianna is a story-driven cRPG set in a Celtic-inspired medieval-fantasy world. Gather your party of legendary Fianna champions and embark on a journey to save the kingdom of Tara from internal strife and the return of an ancient dark force!

name: Drivers of the Apocalypse
description: Drivers of the Apocalypse is a high-octane action-driving combat game set in a vast, treacherous wasteland. You step into the shoes of Artemis, a junior mercenary working for Thunder Strike Force. Your mission? Stop deadly convoys, defeat powerful bosses, and survive.

name: Deepest Fear
description: Sin descripción

name: Prologue: Go Wayback!
description: Prologue: Go Wayback! is a single-player open-world emergent game within the survival genre. With classic survival mechanics and machine learning-driven terrain generation resulting in millions of possible maps, it challenges the players to explore their limits.

name: Starlight Re:Volver
description: Dive into vibrant dream worlds, where every adventure brings you closer to Nishi stardom. Team up to unleash explosive combos and defeat powerful foes. Then, unwind in the lively city of NIM, where you can hang-out, craft and relax with friends.

name: Sol Mates
description: Steer, shield, and blast your way through space in this chaotic co-op party game. You and your ragtag crew will take on missions, make quick decisions, and work together to make a name for yourself in the vast expanse of the universe.

name: Craftlings
description: Welcome to Craftlings, a humorous, relaxing resource-management strategy game, set in a vibrant fantasy world where you guide hapless creatures to build settlements, automate production chains, then mobilize them to protect their homes.

name: Nighthold
description: Build shelters, interact with rescuees, battle against the Rot and raiders to survive another night in this Sandbox RPG. Play Solo or team up with friends in Online Сo-op.

name: Halo: Combat Evolved VR
description: A virtual reality conversion mod for the original PC version of Halo: Combat Evolved.

name: Survev.io
description: Survev.io Battle Royale is a thrilling multiplayer game where you fight to be the last character standing on a shrinking island. Start with nothing but your fists, scavenge for weapons and supplies, and stay within the safe zone. Choose between solo, duo, or squad modes, and use strategy and skills to outlast up to 50 opponents.

name: Aris Arcanum
description: Clyde Colergrave is a Librarian, laboring away in the Aris Archives. Bound by his Knowledge, he is trapped with the festering Ink among the occult stacks of Aris. A unique Victorian roguelite awaits, where a desperate scholar uses Atramancy, the Magic of Ink, to spellcraft his way to salvation...

name: Restaurant Owner: A Restaurant Simulator
description: Step into the world of a Restaurateur in Restaurant Owner: Prologue, where you create unique recipes, manage your restaurant, and satisfy customers. Unlock ingredients, design your menu, and start your journey toward becoming a top Restaurant Manager. Your culinary adventure begins here!

name: Tic Tactic
description: Long ago, the feathered nations lived in harmony. But, nothing lasts forever. Avenge the ducks in this deckbuilding roguelike take on tic-tac-toe. Collect tiles, engage in strategic battles, meet quirky characters, and explore diverse environments as you push ever closer to the chicken stronghold.

name: Pocket Hockey
description: Pocket Hockey brings the excitement of competitive ice hockey to your mobile device. This PvP game focuses on real-time matches where players can test their skills and strive to climb the ranks. Featuring customizable teams with unique characters, the game offers fast-paced gameplay designed to deliver an engaging hockey experience anytime, anywhere.

name: Radio Rayless
description: An unreleased futuristic racing game developed by NOW Production.

name: Project Alpha
description: Sin descripción

name: Through the Backrooms
description: You as Ethan, a robber who wants to end his criminal past. Suddenly you fall in the Backrooms and now you have to solve the mystery of the liminal rooms to find a way out. But you are not alone here...

name: Big Boy Adventure
description: Big Boy Adventure is a casual, singleplayer adventure RPG.Begin the adventure on a small island and help the villagers by fulfilling their requests and keeping them safe from the slimes and monsters that roam the island with increasingly anomalous behavior.

name: Pebbles Quest
description: The Princess has been kidnapped by evildoers! It is now Pebbles Quest to breach the Castle, face a gauntlet of traps and trials, all to rescue his one true love.

name: Ringer
description: The marble roguelike. Ringer reinvents the classic game of marbles with a deckbuilding twist. Discover game breaking synergies, defeat menacing bosses, and accumulate an ever increasing score in this thrilling roguelike

name: Portal Factory
description: Portal Factory is an open-world factory-building game with exploration and dungeons. You can play alone or with friends, explore the world through procedural dungeons, and uncover mysteries!

name: Frozen Injustice: Fridge Adventures
description: Clean, fight, and save the fridge in this action-adventure platformer with classic 3D platforming gameplay! Play as Broco-Lee, a Kung Fu trainee, as you battle bacteria, rescue vegetables, and uncover mysteries across the fridge’s floors. Join the dojo and become the hero this epic adventure needs!

name: Comix Zero
description: Become a wise-cracking immortal fighting an evil regime in world’s first “COMIXVANIA”. Every page could be your last. Every death wipes a piece of your memory. A unique mix of genres: beat ‘em up/metroidvania/roguelike based on comics which we call “COMIXVANIA”. Welcome to Comix Zero.

name: Blast Judgment
description: Wield an unholy arsenal in this FPS Roguelite. Plunder arcane relics and practice forgotten rituals to take on armies of twisted foes. Seek the cruel gods that pulled you from your grave, and inflict your BLAST JUDGMENT.

name: ShapeScale
description: Scale shapes to match the target size

name: Benji and the Crystal of Light
description: Descend into the sci-fi action-adventure of Benji Freese as he is forced into a deadly mission by a sadistic computer AI. Scavenge for supplies and upgrade your weapons to shoot your way through intergalactic mercenaries and hordes of undead. Survive the nightmare and find "The Crystal of Light."

name: Train to Hong Kong
description: The sudden appearance of zombies has disrupted the normal course of things, now you and your comrades have to get to a bunker in Hong Kong. Can you survive in a world where force decides everything and every choice has consequences?

name: Hellrooms
description: Hellrooms: 4-player co-op horror in liminal spaces. Realistic graphics, procedural levels, terrifying entities. Swim, solve puzzles, survive together. Upgrade characters, master skills. Entities listen to voice chat! Experience classic and new backrooms horrors. Unique playthroughs. Free updates!

name: Septic
description: Septic is a gripping precision platformer where you navigate an underground sewer, mastering challenging jumps and dealing with significant setbacks. Test your skills and perseverance in this intense escape adventure.

name: Space and Lazers
description: A chaotic, 4-player co-op space adventure! Manage your ship, fend off alien threats, and pilot nimble fighter jets as you race to deliver humanity's last hope to a new home.

name: Farm Invaders
description: Top down stealth based puzzle game about an alien stealing cows from a farm. Use futuristic gadgets and stay in the shadows to avoid detection. Get all golds in every level to appease the queen and bring honor to your colony!

name: Scramble Up!
description: Scramble Up! is a fast-paced word puzzle game where you rearrange letters to climb through pyramids. Form new words on each level as the timer counts down, adding time with every successful scramble. Test your speed and vocabulary to reach the top before time runs out!

name: Panzer Strike
description: Authentic RTS gameplay straight out of the 2000s. Command your troops, develop strategies, and win World War II battles. Huge maps, thousands of units, long-range firepower, and no building mechanics!

name: Split Apart
description: A retro survival horror game about envy. There's an unrelenting stench of mold and hostility permeating the stale air of this place. You need to find a way out, by any means necessary.

name: RX10-40
description: 『RX10-40』(RX ten forty) is a third-person shooter. Ricocheting Bullets, Shields, and Baton stun guns. An antithesis to an ever-accelerating world.

name: Wind Traveler
description: This is a semi open world ARPG game with HD2D pixel style. In the game, players will play the role of the story protagonist "Red haired Suka" and embark on an exciting adventure in a beautiful continent called Wind Canyon.

name: Fear & Hunger 3
description: The third installment of the Fear and Hunger franchise, teased by its creator Miro Haverinen, is set to be released in the future.

name: Ember's Verge
description: Bushcraft and survive on a deserted island where nature is both your greatest ally and fiercest adversary. As the weather turns colder toward winter, preparation becomes key to survival. Build shelters, hunt, fish, farm, and craft items from natural resources—all without any modern tools.

name: Arcane Drifter
description: In this real-time card battler, you arrive in a once-prosperous mining town where the children have vanished and folks who venture into the mine never return. Explore the depths, craft powerful card synergies and save the town.

name: IDET
description: In a diner at the edge of time, murder is afoot. Serve gourmet meals to the ethereal patrons of the Duskrise Diner. Form relationships. Embrace culinary bliss. Infinite day, endless taste.

name: Nedra
description: NEDRA is a story-driven, atmospheric action-adventure blending survival horror with cosmic terror. Set in a Soviet-era Antarctic station, all the explorers have vanished without a trace, leaving you to uncover the chilling truth.

name: Dissolving Disarray
description: Dissolving Disarray is an RPG Maker adventure horror game. Awaken as a girl lost in a vine-clad room with no recollection of her past. Imprisoned within an otherworldly tower, she must piece together the fragments of her forgotten life and escape before succumbing to the tower's maddening absurdity.

name: T-Abyssal Virus: Origin
description: This game is a first person shooting game with a zombie theme, integrating elements such as first person shooting and fighting zombies. In the game, players are in a world plagued by zombies, collecting gem resources, purchasing attributes, and using weapons to eliminate zombies.

name: Modulus
description: Modulus is a factory automation game where you cut, color, stamp, and assemble 3D building blocks. Design and optimize sprawling factories with creative freedom to efficiently fulfill the orders of the Grand Neural Network.

name: Spoopcore 3D
description: Spoopcore 3D is a low-poly 3D platformer/FPS hybrid where you play as a slime named Reggie on a mission to save ducks from across the multiverse and kill a god. Zoom through levels, find secrets, and dispatch enemies using weapon combos.

name: Project 38
description: "Project 38" plunges players into an abandoned research facility where mutated monsters lurk. Uncover the dark secrets within as you navigate eerie corridors and unravel a chilling narrative. With spine-tingling atmosphere and immersive Hindi voice lines, brace yourself for experience like no other.

name: Never Shall We Die
description: Sail your ship in this 2D world, in search of treasures and secrets, which pays homage to classic Pixel Art games. Gather your crew to reach your goal stronger.

name: The Infernal Mist
description: Descend into the Infernal Mist. A MistCrawler Roguelite where you explore, and Hack and Slash your way through the Mist, while surviving the encroaching darkness. Collect Souls of the Mist, unlock god-like powers and weapons, challenge the merciless wardens, and face the King of the Mist.

name: The Worm's Memoirs
description: The Worm’s Memoirs is a 2D point-and-click narrative game about childhood trauma and what lies beyond it. Follows the Worm as they go through their normal routine of tending a house and uncover their story by traversing between the two parallel worlds of fear and euphoria.

name: Oddbat
description: Have you ever wondered how vampires attain immortality? Join this vampire who transforms into a bat to overcome all the challenges that arise, in order to perform a ritual unlike any other!

name: Newton
description: Newton is a pixel art platformer. Collect apples, master gravity and set high scores in this simple but challenging adventure!

name: Cats Hidden in USA
description: Find hundreds of cats cats hiding in the good 'ol United States of America in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Harborde
description: Harborde combines survivors/roguelite gameplay with base building and management.

name: 10-in-1 Games Bundle for Kids & Toddlers
description:
Endless fun for little hands.
From farm to safari,
let curiosity bloom!

name: Me And Gamer Girl: Gamer-joshi to Hikikomori
description: The person behind the beautiful avatar is... a real-life beauty!? As you meet and become close with the beautiful gamer girl, your relationship blossoms into romance...

name: Jerry Anker and the Quest to get Love
description: Tonight is the night! Next door at the spooky mansion, the most famous girls are throwing the hottest party in history!

name: A Loddle to the Left
description: A Little to the Left is a cozy puzzle game that has you sort, stack, and organize household items into pleasing arrangements while you keep an eye out for a mischievous cat with an inclination for chaos.

name: Plants vs. Zombies Hybrid Version
description:
Plants vs. Zombies: Hybrid Version is a mod of the original Plants vs. Zombies created by 潜艇伟伟迷 (SubmarineWeiWeiPVZ) and his team.
The mod primarily features plants that are hybrids of two or multiple plants, combining said plants' attributes and abilities in unique ways. The mod also features zombies that wear armor from other zombies, new armor types entirely, and zombies that similarly function as hybrids of one another.

name: Vextorial
description: Vextorial is a Multi-Dimensional puzzle-platformer where you play as Pilo, a 2D creature exploring a 3D space. Solve unique mind-bending puzzles by shifting gravity around you to explore an ancient ruin and uncover the mystery of your lost memories.

name: Magician Lord 2
description: An unreleased sequel to Magician Lord that had been intended for the Neo Geo Pocket.

name: Amazing Garden
description: A game centered around attracting animals to their gardens and trading them with other players, which would eventually get reworked into Viva Pinata.

name: Arms of God
description: Gear up for an epic battle through hell in this next-gen autoshooter with Doom-inspired gore vibes, roguelite mechanics, and a deep, satisfying combat feel. Wield five weapons at once, upgrade and merge them to forge indestructible builds, and bring divine justice to a world on the brink of chaos.

name: Jitter Games
description:
Jitter Games is a collection of Twitch Integrated Minigames.

Jitter provides new forms of audience engagement and monetisation for Twitch streamers. The fully moddable massive scale playgrounds let hosts play fully interactive mini-games with all of their viewers, who can take part directly in the game or by directing the action via Twitch chat integration.

name: TinyHoopers
description:
Welcome to TinyHoopers world!

TinyHoopers is an engaging and addictive sandbox-style basketball video game that replicates the experience of playing pickup basketball, capturing the casual social atmosphere of a playground game but including unique game mechanisms.

The game is set in a digital world parallel to ours, where basketball is the major sport! Hoopers spend their time, hooping and leveling up.

name: After The End
description: In AFTER THE END, you will lead a group of survivors in a world devastated by a zombie apocalypse. Face resource scarcity, such as food and medicine, while dealing with the constant threat of zombie hordes and armed human enemies. Every decision can mean the difference between life and death, and permanent death means every choice has lasting consequences. With multiple playable characters, each with their own skills and stories, you must build and protect your base, manage your resources wisely, and fight to survive in a relentless environment.

name: The War of the Worlds: Siberia
description:
The year is 1896. The Martian invasion wipes cities and entire civilizations out of existence. Separated from his loved ones, a young student escapes the capital city already conquered by the aliens.
Along with the player, he will have to survive in the distinctive and dangerous Siberia, stand against the forces of the old world, and inevitably confront its new masters.

Gather and manage resources, build various facilities to house your snakes, make sure they are cared for to keep them happy, and collect their beautiful scales, to forge stronger equipment and scale up!

Build your customizable container home, play mini-games, embark on simple quests, and connect with friends in real-time. With regular updates, endless adventures, and a creative community, the m00m resistance needs you to shape the future and make your mark in the fight against the F8 Corporation!

name: Symptoms of Deceit
description:
You've been working at the Willani Epidemiology Lab as a secretary for around a year now. The researchers appreciate you, but they're not allowed to share the confidential details of their work with you.

Things are going well until your coworkers begin acting strange and you hear rumors of the lab performing unethical experiments. As your coworkers dodge your questions, you meet a new neighbor who seems a little too eager to insert himself into your life.

name: Mu: Dark Epoch
description: MU: Dark Epoch is a fantasy MMORPG mobile game that combines high quality, fast-paced gameplay, and innovative features. As the best MU Installment in the series by far, it offers impressive dynamic costumes and stunning graphic performance.

name: Lime Juice
description: Lime Juice is a charming and relaxing puzzle adventure about reliving your childhood imaginations. Play as a kid and explore a mysterious sketchbook while waiting for your bus, and bring the drawings to life with your imagination to build a series of delightful, animated scenes.

name: Barkane: The Folds of Calamity
description: Take control of Marmalade, a magical Shiba Inu, on her journey to traverse a paper world and collect the gems of ultimate power! In Barkane: the Folds of Calamity, players navigate a series of 3D paper-folding puzzles, where they must manipulate the level itself to progress. Players can fold sections of the level along joints, allowing them to reshape the world, navigate around obstacles, and solve clever challenges. Move Marmalade around the level in order to collect the crystal shards, activate the goal, and progress to the following level.

name: Cumulative Pack 2
description: Cumulative Pack 2 is a huge expansion mod for the first-person shooter S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chernobyl. It completely overhauls most aspects of the game, and contains vast amounts of new content (hundreds of hours of quests and open-world gameplay, hundreds of new items and characters, dozens of locations). OP-2 has been evolving for over a decade from many other mods such as Narodnaya Solyanka (NS), adapted into a single gigantic mod with several large overlapping storylines

name: Slumbering Woods
description: Slumbering Woods is a hand-drawn adventure where you rebuild a forgotten village, grow floating mushroom islands, cultivate plants, and uncover hidden lore in a vibrant, living world.

name: Orcs Will Never Be Slaves
description: "Orcs Will Never Be Slaves" is a rogue-like hack-and-slash game set in a fantasy world. You play as an orc warrior battling in arenas against various enemies to earn honor and clear your ancestors' sins.

name: Hunters Inc
description: Hunters Inc. is a 1-4 player co-op melee FPS featuring rampaging Orc hunters, gigantic monsters to slay and procedurally generated environments teeming with deadly flora and fauna.

name: Castle 3D
description:
Personally gave you the order; in 24 hours you are to get into the Castle at any price and fake Hitler's suicide. You are a colonel of Soviet foreign intelligence and clearly understand that this 'punitive operation' could be your last mission, but you are ready to fulfill your duty to the motherland and the Party without hesitation or delay.

Ominous Castle is guarded by the most experienced and pitiless fighters of SS riot, craving for unleashing their incinerating wrath on anyone who dares to set a foot on their territory. But your impressive arsenal will shed a dense shower of lead on the enemy. You will be armed with the most fatal weapon, which will make your enemies draw back step after another. Fury against will for victory… tyranny against courage… You are to fight with the genetic creation of German scientists – superman and supersoldier.

name: Castlevania
description: A cancelled Castlevania project by Koji Igarashi was announced at E3 2008 by Konami. At the Tokyo Game Show 2008, a short teaser was shown. It was intended to feature Alucard as the main character, and the game was supposed to be in 3D, similar to Lords of Shadow, which came later. There has been no official word on the status of the project since, and Koji Igarashi left the company.

name: MegaMu
description: MEGAMU aims to offer the best gaming experience, capable of avoiding repetitive tasks while maintaining challenges and objectives even for advanced players. The server has settings that adapt to the player's progress and also provide goals to be achieved.

name: Upg
description: upg (pronounced up-gee) is a fast-paced bullet heaven auto-shooter where you focus on movement while your weapons do the shooting. dash through procedurally generated levels, collecting upgrades and taking down waves of enemies.

description: Interesting challenges and 3D graphics. Equipped with a portal gun, you'll explore locations, move from room to room, solve puzzles, complete thrilling challenges, and find places to open portals that help you navigate through space. Levels will be challenging, filled with traps, dangers, and difficult logic puzzles.

name: Super Mario Ticks of Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Solborne Gorge
description: Bathed in the presence of a dark, uncaring sun, the pumpkin-populated abattoir of Solbone Gorge struggles to release itself from diseased misery. This features very simple mechanics, and belongs to the "walking simulator" style of game. Only mouse-look and simple movement controls are required.

name: The Vomit
description: Sin descripción

name: Nomad Idle
description: Face waves of enemies automatically and create builds by distributing stat points, leveling up equipment, choosing passive skills, summons, on-hit effects, and more. An idle game about killing hordes of enemies, becoming stronger, and exploring an unfolding storyline. A spin-off of Nomad Survival.

name: Don't Drop The Cake
description: Let's deliver a cake to our customer. To reach them, you must traverse a space filled with monstrous creatures. If fear makes you tremble or you drop the cake in panic, you'll face the customer's wrath. This challenge isn't for cowards. Only the brave and composed will succeed. Are you up for it?

name: Church of Shadows
description: In a cursed, abandoned church, you must destroy six demonic spell books to weaken the evil & vengeful witch sealed away for centuries. Evade her twisted creations, burn the books, and survive her deadly traps before she claims your soul. Will you escape, or be bound forever?

name: Run the Rings
description: A PvP spaceship management auto battler! Build a custom spaceship layout and compete against other players. Play your way and be a bounty hunter, space pirate, or merchant trader.

name: Ortunia Mysteries: Where Did Everybody Go?
description: A first person escape room game. Welcome to Ortunia! Your friend needs your help! Navigate through an inn, some catacombs, a cathedral and more, while solving puzzles and finding secrets. Discover what is chasing your friend and his companions and why they are being chased.

name: Scary Stories
description: A spooky text-based, choose-your-own-adventure style game that tells several spine-chilling tales with several choices and items throughout, these may change your path... Can you uncover the truth?

name: Fluff'n'Roll
description: Navigate tricky terrain, dodge obstacles, and roll your way to victory in Fluff’n’Roll! Master your skills to conquer increasingly challenging levels.

name: UniqKiller: Urban Shooter
description: UniqKiller is an intense F2P topdown third-person shooter, PvP, with automatic shooting. Combine different types of bodies, classes, skills, weapons, skins, to create unique heroes (UNIQS), both in appearance and gameplay, for battles in urban environments.

name: Classic Solitaire
description: Play the classic card game of Solitaire! Experience the fun and strategy of sequencing the cards from a randomly ordered deck. Play casually at your leisure or beat your best time by going through the stock pile the fewest possible times.

name: The Essence of Luna
description: When an unsuspecting person named Saruky learns about the terrible events that could take place in the future, He makes it his mission to try and stop it from happening.

name: Cold Sweat
description: Cold Sweat is a first-person single player extraction shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Choose between a casual or hardcore experience as you complete missions for traders, collect loot, customize your firearms, and shoot your way through other survivors and the undead.

name: Cell Command
description: TURN-BASED TACTICS meets SNAKE: A new roguelike in the Genome Guardian universe. SPLICE DNA to create new units, enhance their genetics, and take on the Abyss virus once more in a variety of different modes & match types.

name: Pirate Escape
description: Pirate Escape is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you are the captain of you own pirate ship as you raid merchant ships and fight against the navy. Choose from a variety of crew members and items to create unique builds and survive until you reach Tortuga.

name: Children's Garden
description: Welcome to a puzzle game where your goal is to guide young souls to peace. Set in Sai no Kawara, a hell for children, you’ll stack the divine toy "Gift" bestowed by the gods. Discover their memories and the stories they left behind.

name: Car Wash
description: Car Wash is a cozy experience where you transform dirty, old cars into gleaming masterpieces. Enjoy the relaxing process of scrubbing, polishing, and adding the perfect finishing touch with the power of fresh soap and a hint of clean perfume!

name: Gretel: The Lost Tale
description: In a world devastated by hunger, siblings Gretel and Hansel are forced to survive. Join Gretel in an alternative take on the classic Grimm brothers’ tale. Hide from adults and find the way home—but beware, trust no one.

name: Hellstrom: Reign
description: Hellstorm: Reign is a story-driven first-person shooter game where you play as an advanced soldier from Itopia. In the game, you infiltrate the dystopian wasteland and complete missions assigned to you, all while uncovering the hidden secrets of Itopia.

name: They Follow You
description: Use a ship to explore and a hive-mind to take out enemies. A post-apocalyptic, adventure horror game, you must explore a ruined earth with your ship (equipped with a beam and light) and find lairs to take out simplified humans known as Simples.

name: Comet Rogue
description: Fast-paced mining roguelike where you mine and explore procedurally-generated asteroids. Collect dozens of unique upgrades to aid you in your quest for riches! (and freedom...)

name: Shattered Sun
description: Shattered Sun is a fast-paced roguelike where you pilot a powerful mech to escape a doomed star system by battling through hostile planets, upgrading your gear, and racing against time before the sun explodes.

name: Trashworld Chaos
description: Imagine a world completely overrun by trash! This is no ordinary apocalypse – this is a filthy, repulsive world dominated by grotesque garbage creatures, evolved from the very trash heaps they once hid in. Their goal? To devour what’s left of humanity.

name: Nothing Beyond This Point
description: In the Void, everyone is alone, and you're no exception. Use your health as damage, create your own character with abilities and Sigils, and fight through corrupted souls in this top-down action Metroidvania. Don't be fooled - you're nobody's last hope.

name: Nexus M4
description: Nexus M4 is an oriental fantasy MMORPG featuring stunning graphics and dynamic combat. Explore a vast open world filled with adventures, face challenging enemies, gather valuable resources, and level up your character. Join clans, engage in epic wars, and claim your place in this unique universe.

name: Pair a Dice
description: Pair A Dice is a Co-Op Dice Roller where you harness the power of magic dice to create enemies, craft items, and defeat bosses!

name: Slime in a Trench Coat: A Cooking Mystery
description: Slime in a Trench Coat: A Cooking Mystery is a narrative-driven 2D mystery sidescroller set in a fantasy world filled with action, cooking, and intrigue. Solve puzzles, fight monsters, and unlock new recipes as you follow Jin and Jel on their journey to uncover the mystery of Juniper’s disappearance

name: Panzer Planet
description: Fast-paced, twin sticker, top-down arena shooter with roguelite elements, where you pilot a powerful tank on spherical mini planets to fight hordes of zombies and monsters. Collect your bounty for killing your enemies to get new weapons and powerups to improve your skills.

name: Superno
description: A character based movement shooter

name: Heartsworn Abyss
description: Heartsworn Abyss is a survival-thriller taking place in a modern dystopian world. Can Rei, a broken man whose life is on the mend, hope to oppose the sinister machinations of Saitou Corporation? Or will he and Akari be swallowed by Miyogawa’s darkness, to be strung along like broken puppets?

name: Broken Time
description: Broken Time - a world where time no longer matters. This low-polygon action game immerses players in a post-apocalyptic environment where every movement changes the course of events. Fight and gather resources to survive in this madness.

name: Lily's World XD
description: Lily’s World XD is a psychological horror game where you investigate a young girl’s computer. Channel your inner 2000s teen as you read her old conversations, customize her blog, and look through her embarrassing selfies. That is, until you find messages addressed to you...

name: New Moons
description: New Moons is a free-to-play third-person and first-person action shooter powered by Unreal Engine 5. Master legendary characters, explore a rich campaign, and dominate modes like Battle Royale, Tactical 5v5, MOBA and many more. Wishlist now for Closed Beta access and exclusive rewards!

name: Crazy Tanks
description: Crazy Tanks is a Free to play game where bullets bounce of walls, maps have movable crates, and there are Heal and shield Power-Ups in a Free For all Round with up to 10 players to see who is the best one.

name: The Misfits
description: The Misfits is a Medieval Fantasy RPG, heavily influenced by narrative, with turn-based combat where the relationships between party members will affect their entire development. Guide The Misfits on their journey in search of purpose.

name: Motherland
description: Motherland is an open-world adventure set in the ruins of a massive space colony. Join Ellie, a protagonist who has lost her memory, and her companion Will as they freely explore the abandoned city. With no restrictions, players are free to explore and uncover the mysteries of this vast world.

name: Music of Destiny: Corrupted Dungeons
description: An ancient evil descends, and you will join the Crimson Knights to save the world! In this Roguelite game, assemble a team of knights and monsters, explore dungeons, collect gear, build defenses, and defeat dungeon monsters!

name: Santa
description: A 1-4 player co-op Christmas horror game. You have 3 days to deliver the presents and save Christmas, or die trying.

name: Elissa Ⅰ: Body in the bedroom
description: The mystery novelist MEL Gideon, whose career is facing difficulties, receives a strange letter claiming someone is in trouble and needs her help. Intrigued, she decides to investigate. As she digs deeper, she starts to realize that her past is far more complicated than she ever imagined...

name: Oni's Tale
description: Oni’s Tale is a vibrant 2D anime-style platformer and typing adventure inspired by an ancient Japanese story. Join Oni siblings Gomu and Momo on a journey through a fantastical world filled with puzzles, challenges, and wonder. Test your skills and uncover a magical tale of friendship and discovery!

name: The Forbidden Flask
description: In a kingdom that has outlawed potion making, an herbalist turned brew-master continues to sell potions on the underground market from the back of their tavern. Serve both ale and potions to customers, but don't get caught selling potions when the guards make their rounds!

name: HitTube
description: Top-Down arcade where you're a vlogger — Travel around the world, make streams of how you destroy everything around and play dozens of minigames!

name: Beastbound
description: Explore the ever-shifting world of Beastbound where with every new run comes new Beasts to build your team with and new enemies to face.

name: Good Boy Simulator
description: Navigate the asylum as a dog, evade deadly maniacs, uncover the cult's dark secrets behind your owner's kidnapping, and preserve your sanity in this hellish nightmare.

name: Silhoun
description: Enter Silhoun, a town of no one and everywhere all at once. A short horror game with puzzle elements, set in the void.

name: Citypurger
description: A kinetic brainwipe for citybound psyches! A soothing and informative walking tour of glitchbuild architectural nullities that also cleans out unwanted mental detritus. Let our patented logobuzz hypnotyping technology wash over your buildingweary brainpan... All while you effortlessly fortify your subconscious for future oneiric scenarios! Repeat wash cycles as many times as needed. No two runthroughs are the same!

name: Fantastic Annihilation
description:
As the most devout follower of the Cult of the Last Messiah, you've been elevated to the role of the Great Annihilator. Your sacred mission: to annihilate every last trace of life on Earth and return the planet to its original, pure, desolate state—a barren world of rocky landscapes, devoid of sin and life.

But be warned: failure in your mission means your own annihilation

The Legend of Zelda: The Shadowgazer is a fan game being developed in Game Maker by King Mob, and features:

Two parallel versions of the game world: the everyday waking world, and its nightmarish counterpart, unseen by all except those trained to use the Shadowgazer - a magical totem that protects the bearer from the nightmare realm's maddening effects;

A rotating three-day schedule, governed by the comings and goings of the ships in the port town of Hyrule. Record valuable information regarding the nightmares of the passengers and crew in your Cabin Boy's Handbook.

name: Memoralysis: The Scorched Home
description:
An unusual case calls for an unusual detective.

MEMORALYSIS is a murder mystery visual novel with point and click elements that follows the psychic detective Philon Delancy to a strange seaside town to solve the murder of one of its most notable public figures. What starts as a routine house call quickly reveals a tangle of messy relationships, local superstitions, and past unsolved mysteries— and at the center of it all is the victim’s enigmatic niece, Celosia James.

He’s not one to balk at whisperings of the occult. How could he, when the greatest tool at his disposal is the ability to catch glimpses of his suspects’ memories? But surely the rumors about the young heiress have been greatly exaggerated. After all, everyone knows demonic possession isn’t real.

One of the Federation's finest teams, comprised of a group of...misfits, to put it somewhat bluntly.

This game is a spinoff akin to Shadow the Hedgehog and Luigi's Mansion, and Sonic Chronicles and Paper Mario, where the spotlight shifts to background characters, in this case a bunch of new ones, with a different RPG genre. Samus is almost nonexistent, instead the game focuses more on the biology, lore and backstory that enriches every Metroid game to date. Chalk River is a dynamic Wild West-themed metaverse that blends immersive storytelling, intense PvP action, and player-driven exploration. Set in an expansive frontier, players can forge their legacy as outlaws, lawmen, or entrepreneurs.

Engage in high-stakes deathmatches, craft powerful NFTs, trade rare items, and complete story-rich missions to uncover the secrets of the rugged Chalk River Valley. With evolving gameplay fueled by blockchain technology, Chalk River offers a unique mix of adventure, strategy, and community-driven content. Saddle up and carve your path in this ever-expanding digital frontier!

name: Ardente: La Grande Guerre
description:
In 1917, the war is violent on the Verdun front. But you are not one of those heroes who take up arms and kill enemies by the dozen. You are on the front to save the lives of wounded soldiers in the trenches. Fortunately, the invention of the “Little Curie”, a car created to transport radiology equipment on the battlefield, will help save lives where the wounded are dying.

You will drive and move from tent to tent to help doctors on site. But be careful, war is all around and the number of wounded is significant. Most will die, whether you like it or not.

Now the real question is : who are you going to save?

War isn't won with feelings and your choices will have consequences. Everything is going very fast and the slightest hesitation can be fatal for you and others.

You alone cannot change the course of war, but you can change the fate of many families.
